SimpleSequencingDisplay

enspire.interactivity.display.IActivityDisplay
enspire.interactivity.display.SimpleSequencingDisplay

Event that is dispatched from any Movie Clip that inherits from HotSpot when the standard mouse actions are performed on the clip.

Summary
